beschreibung: We develop smart web & AI solutions for companies that think ahead.

footer.brand_description:
Digital Intelligence from Tyrol –
AI, Mobile & Web solutions with substance.

about_welcome: Welcome to TirolAI – where ideas become scalable, intelligent software solutions. Our team brings perspectives from North and South Tyrol together, working cross-border to advance digital innovation practically and responsibly.
about_competencies: Our competencies combine Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, and modern web development. We develop technologies with real added value – integrated, user-oriented, and future-proof.
about_vision_text: We believe intelligent systems should solve concrete problems – not chase trends. TirolAI stands for understandable, modular, and transparent technology. Our goal is to make AI and IoT accessible not only to large companies but also to startups, SMEs, and organizations in Tyrol.
about_think_ahead: We don't just think along – we think ahead. Together with our clients, we design digital tools that simplify processes, support decisions, and create sustainable added value.
about_martin_desc: BSc in Software Engineering, currently MSc in Artificial Intelligence. Martin is our machine learning specialist focusing on reinforcement learning, model-based AI, and data-driven systems. He brings deep understanding of backend development, API design, databases, and scalable system architectures – ensuring complex AI systems run performant and robust in production.
about_lukas_desc: BSc in Software Engineering, currently MSc in Artificial Intelligence. Experienced in modern web development (frontend & backend), UI/UX design, DevOps, and integrating AI systems into scalable web platforms. Also active in IoT security research with deep knowledge in IT security and embedded systems.
about_robert_desc: BSc in Software Engineering, currently MSc in Artificial Intelligence. Robert has experience in international companies developing and optimizing ERP systems, especially SAP. Focused on integrating SAP with modern web technologies and AI to automate business processes intelligently. Specialized on smart interfaces, scalable architectures, and efficient, future-proof system solutions.
about_qualities_list: Understanding of technical depth AND user needs
Agile development and modular system architecture
about_mission_text: We want Tyrol – from North to South – to be a place where modern technology does not lag behind but leads. TirolAI is the interface between creative ideas and technological implementation. Whether pilot project or fullstack system: we accompany you from the first concept to final implementation – practical, cross-border, and future-proof.
about_belief: We believe in technology that inspires – and collaboration that excites.

ki_potenzialanalyse.title: AI Potential Analysis
ki_potenzialanalyse.text: We analyze your processes and identify meaningful AI use cases.
ki_potenzialanalyse.paragraph1: Many companies know that artificial intelligence offers enormous potential — but where to start concretely?
ki_potenzialanalyse.paragraph2: In our AI potential workshop, we analyze your processes, data, and goals together.

ai_prototyping.title: AI Prototyping
ai_prototyping.text: Quick prototypes for chatbots, forecasting, OCR and more.
ai_prototyping.paragraph1: AI prototyping allows you to test ideas quickly without committing to full-scale development.
ai_prototyping.paragraph2: We implement concrete use cases like chatbots, image recognition, or prediction models rapidly and pragmatically – using real data if needed.

ai_agents.title: AI Agents & Co-Pilots
ai_agents.text: Intelligent agents powered by LLMs & retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
ai_agents.paragraph1: LLM-based agents can understand, reason, and respond to individual queries using your internal knowledge.
ai_agents.paragraph2: We build smart co-pilots and chat systems that access your data, analyze documents, or assist with decision-making.
ai_agents.scope_item1: Conversational agents & chatbots (e.g., for customer support & HR)
ai_agents.scope_item2: Search internal knowledge bases with natural language
ai_agents.scope_item4: AI co-pilots for departments (e.g., legal, medical, technical)
ai_agents.scope_item5: LLM-based API integration for complex automations

prozessautomatisierung.title: Process Automation
prozessautomatisierung.text: Automate back office, accounting & HR using RPA and smart workflows.
prozessautomatisierung.paragraph1: Repetitive manual tasks are time-consuming and error-prone.
prozessautomatisierung.paragraph2: With robotic process automation (RPA) and smart workflows, we help you streamline operations and improve efficiency.

web_app_entwicklung.title: Web & App Development
web_app_entwicklung.text: Custom platforms, portals & apps with AI integration.
web_app_entwicklung.paragraph1: We develop tailored web solutions and mobile apps that integrate seamlessly into your existing systems.
web_app_entwicklung.paragraph2: From concept to UI/UX and performance – we consider all aspects, including optional AI features.
web_app_entwicklung.scope_item5: Web applications with integrated AI features

iot_predictive.title: IoT & Predictive Solutions
iot_predictive.text: Leverage machine data for predictive maintenance & Industry 4.0.
iot_predictive.paragraph1: We connect IoT devices, collect machine data, and develop data-driven models for predictive maintenance and optimization.
iot_predictive.paragraph2: Our solutions integrate into existing ERP/MES systems and enable real-time, data-based decision-making.

ai_schulungen.title: AI Training
ai_schulungen.text: Empower your team for responsible & efficient AI usage.
ai_schulungen.paragraph1: Employees may still be skeptical of AI – but with the right knowledge, they can unlock its full productivity potential.
ai_schulungen.paragraph2: We offer hands-on training on GPT, everyday AI tools, data protection, ethics, and effective prompting techniques.
ai_schulungen.scope_item4: Data protection when working with AI

foerderberatung.title: Funding Consulting
foerderberatung.text: Make the most of funding from aws, FFG & the Province of Tyrol.
foerderberatung.paragraph1: Digital innovation projects are eligible for regional, national, and EU funding – but many opportunities go unused.
foerderberatung.paragraph2: We know the funding landscape (aws, FFG, Province of Tyrol) and support you in applying, documenting, and implementing your project.
